projects.title: Prompt iteration
projects.bodyText:
- An app to help with prompt engineering
 - Compares the most recent pair of prompts/responses
 - Suggests improvements to the prompt

projects.title: Discord party bot
projects.bodyText:
- A bot that brings fun to your Discord server
 - Greets people in voice channels, plays music, and sends annoucements
 - Translates messages (if it feels like it)

projects.title: Python playground
projects.bodyText:
- A collection of fun Python things I played around with
 - Tools, scripts, interesting code

projects.title: SpellCheck
projects.bodyText: - A web game that teaches children the concepts behind neural networks
